entry.data:
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
PATCHY FOG
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
